name: underlineGlyphRange(_:underlineType:lineFragmentRect:lineFragmentGlyphRange:containerOrigin:)
desc: Calculates subranges to underline for the specified glyphs and draws the underlining as appropriate.
declaration:
func underlineGlyphRange(_ glyphRange: NSRange, 
           underlineType underlineVal: NSUnderlineStyle, 
        lineFragmentRect lineRect: CGRect, 
  lineFragmentGlyphRange lineGlyphRange: NSRange, 
         containerOrigin: CGPoint)
